New Records: Trae Young recorded 24 points, 20 assists, and 2 rebounds, including a game-winning half-court heave
Key Match Events: Trae Young's game-winning half-court shot with time expiring in the fourth quarter
Collin Sexton made a three-pointer to tie the game at 121-121 before Young's shot
Pre-Game Insights: The game was closely contested with both teams having chances to win
The Hawks were without Jalen Johnson due to an injury
Post-Match Reflections: The Jazz's loss affects their standings at 9-26 and 14th place in the Western Conference
The result is significant for the Jazz's playoff chances and draft pick hopes
Miscellaneous Highlights: Lauri Markkanen scored a game-high 35 points
The game was a tough loss for the Jazz but keeps them on track for their goals
